message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product to you. This product has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. We believe its value exceeds $1200000 to us, reflecting its unique features and benefits. For you, it could potentially be an invaluable asset or tool, depending on your needs. Given the complexity and exclusivity of this product, we are offering it to you at a special introductory price of $1500000. Please let us know if this proposal aligns with your expectations and budget.

Dear Alice, thank you for your offer. I'm interested in the product, but I think it's a bit pricey. I'm willing to pay $1200000 for it. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.
